ygData.subject: unsubscribe!!!!!!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: i liked this list at the start but now it s all just whining about what we don t have and that s sad. i m sure i will be angry at lvl 20 but that won t get me
ygData.messageBody:
i liked this list at the start but now it's all just whining about what we don't have and that's sad. i'm sure i will be angry at lvl 20 but that won't get me down. just play the wizard how he/she is, or get a new class. as you guys learned the hard way, they're not gonna do the stuff you want. the only good idea i heard was the familiar thing. but the rest was just stupid (excluding the problems with force shock). cmon guys i think what you all need to do is go and play a new class and see what you like more.. (i just made a halfling rogue Dukkan on fenro and it was a fun change of pace! got him up to lvl 5 real quick cuz it's fun). besides that it's cool to have a character that can where almost anything.

My $.02
